purpose: To provide a framework for creating serverless agents that can perform various tasks autonomously in a distributed environment.
principle: Designed to operate independently while leveraging cloud resources for scalability and efficiency.
reusability: Agents are built with modular components that can be reused across different projects and applications.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, which may imply incomplete features and potential instability. Limited to specific cloud environments.
name: edge-agents
highlight: Framework for creating modular, serverless agents that operate autonomously in cloud environments.
